This twin pack will be $2 off!

Bay Area (1/27 - 2/23)
San Diego (1/13 - 2/9)
Midwest (12/23 - 1/15)
Northeast (1/12 - 2/9)
Southeast (1/20 - 2/16)

📝 Buffalo Chicken Dip Recipe

Ingredients

✔️ 2 cups cooked, shredded chicken (rotisserie chicken is what I used)
✔️ 8 oz cream cheese, softened
✔️ 1/2 cup Frank’s RedHot sauce 
✔️ 1/2 cup ranch 
✔️ 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (plus extra for topping)
Sliced chives for garnish

Instructions

Preheat Oven: Preheat your oven to 375°F.

In a large bowl, combine the chicken, cream cheese, Frank’s RedHot sauce, cheese and ranch dressing. Stir until smooth.

Spread the mixture into a cast iron skillet or 8x8-inch baking dish. Sprinkle additional cheddar cheese on top.

Bake: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the dip is hot and bubbly.

Garnish and Serve: Remove from the oven, garnish with chives (optional), and serve warm.

Serving Suggestions:

Serve with tortilla chips, celery sticks, carrots, or crackers for dipping!

📝 Air-Fry Chicken and Veggies Recipe:
1. Pat Chicken Dry and Coat Both Sides with Olive Oil.

2. Season both sides generously with Kinder’s Organic Garlic & Herb Seasoning.

3. Add to Air Fryer for 20-25 (depending on thickness of chicken) at 370°.

4. Flip Chicken Half Way Through.

5. Oil and Season Veggies and Air Fry for the Last 5 Minutes.

Enjoy ☺️
